dt: {bc}the partially compacted granular snow that forms the surface part of the upper end of a glacier

et: French dialect (Swiss), from Vulgar Latin {it}*nivatum{/it}, from Latin {it}niv-, nix{/it} snow {ma}{mat|snow|}{/ma}
shortdef: the partially compacted granular snow that forms the surface part of the upper end of a glacier; broadly : a field of granular snow
